TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 會實作 XAML 標記延伸，以傳回 null 物件，可用於在 XAML 中明確將值設定為 null。

span.span: Implements a XAML markup extension in order to return a null object, which you can use to explicitly set values to null in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中，null 和空字串通常是不相等。In XAML, null and empty string are generally not equivalent. 您使用`{x:Null}`延伸使用方式，若要設定的屬性，將基礎的屬性設定為`null`。You use the `{x:Null}` extension usage in order to set an attribute that sets the underlying property to `null`. 如需有關如何設定為 null 的值是在 XAML 中的案例相關的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)。For more information on how setting null values is relevant for scenarios in XAML, see [x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md). 這個類別是標記延伸實作。This class is a markup extension implementation. 標記延伸類別存在主要是為了提供基礎結構支援 XAML 處理器如何解譯特定延伸模組。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for how XAML processors interpret a particular extension. 標記延伸實作類別公開的成員通常不適合從您的程式碼呼叫。The members that markup extension implementation classes expose are not typically intended to be called from your code. 這個標記延伸模組類別支援[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md).NET XAML 服務的使用方式。This markup extension class supports the [x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md) usage for .NET XAML Services. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別 (和`x:Null`標記延伸模組 XAML 行為支援，以及相關的 xmlns 對應) 存在於 PresentationFramework WPF 特定組件。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class (and the `x:Null` markup extension XAML behavior support as well as the relevant xmlns mapping) existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationFramework. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]， System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 這可讓`x:Null`可供使用.NET XAML 服務所參考之架構的應用程式的使用方式。This makes the `x:Null` usage available to applications using frameworks that reference .NET XAML Services. 您不會在只要您的目標做為參考的組件需要 PresentationFramework [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。You do not need PresentationFramework as a referenced assembly so long as you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). System.Xaml 組件會使用將組件中的所有類型都對應至 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)])。The System.Xaml assembly uses to map all types in the assembly to the XAML namespace for the XAML language ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]). 通常您會宣告的前置詞[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]在根項目對應，然後使用前置詞`x`。Typically you declare a prefix for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] in a root element mapping and use the prefix `x`. ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes WPF 相依性屬性，當您將相依性屬性值為`null`，不一定將屬性設為預設值，即使它是參考屬性。For WPF dependency properties, when you set a dependency property value to `null`, you are not necessarily setting the property to its default value, even if it is a reference property. 相依性屬性的預設值取決於其相依性屬性註冊。The default value of a dependency property depends on its dependency property registration. 未設定的值不一定`null`; 請參閱。An unset value is not necessarily `null` either; see . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 或是[相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see or [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md).

related.span: XAML 類型轉換器或標記延伸

span.span: Type Converters or Markup Extensions for XAML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以為標記延伸實作提供服務的物件。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension implementation.

summary.span: 提供 以當做此標記延伸之輸出的值。

span.span: Provides to use as a value as the output of this markup extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援 XAML 處理器實作，並不是直接呼叫。This method supports XAML processor implementations, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 處理器實作會建立包含的物件圖形時，會使用這個方法`x:Null`延伸使用方式。A XAML processor implementation uses this method when it creates object graphs that include an `x:Null` extension usage. 這會依賴適用於 XAML 處理器的一般行為時它們會處理任何並呼叫其`ProvideValue`實作。This relies on general behavior for XAML processors when they process any and call its `ProvideValue` implementation. 此實作不需要為基礎的服務上傳入`serviceProvider`。This implementation does not rely on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 它一律會傳回 null 參考，不論內容為何。It always returns a null reference regardless of context. 在.NET Framework XAML 服務實作中，要傳回的值由參考靜態值。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the value to return is obtained by referencing the static value.
